cmake_minimum_required (VERSION 3.1)

set(PROJNAME skia)
set(CHAPTER "third_party")

include_directories(${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/../libjpeg-turbo)
include_directories(${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/../libpng)

set_property(TARGET ${PROJNAME} PROPERTY FOLDER ${CHAPTER})
